com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.views

Class ContentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.events.EventBase
      • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.views.View
        • com.onkiup.minedroid.gui.views.ContentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScrollView, TextView, ViewGroup

    public abstract class ContentView
extends View
    Parent class for all GUI elements that have any content inside of them
